logManagementAndIntegrity: Microsoft Sentinel integration: Comprehensive incident log management with STIX 2.1 compatibility and cryptographic integrity protection
Azure Log Analytics workspaces: Centralized incident data storage with retention management and query optimization
Immutable storage implementation: Tamper-evident logging with cryptographic hash validation and audit trail protection
Access control automation: Role-based log access with MFA requirements and comprehensive activity auditing
Backup and disaster recovery: Geo-redundant log backup with cross-region replication and recovery capabilities
patternAnalysisAutomation: Azure Machine Learning platforms: Automated pattern detection with anomaly identification and trend analysis capabilities
MITRE ATT&CK framework integration: Attack vector analysis with technique mapping and lateral movement detection
Threat intelligence platforms: CVE correlation with exploit pattern identification and zero-day detection capabilities
Statistical analysis tools: Time-series analysis with seasonal pattern detection and predictive forecasting
Behavioral analytics platforms: User and entity behavior analysis with deviation detection and risk scoring
reviewProcessAutomation: ServiceNow workflow automation: Automated review scheduling with stakeholder notification and agenda generation
Microsoft Teams integration: Collaborative review processes with documentation automation and action item tracking
Calendar integration platforms: Schedule management with automated reminders and availability coordination
Document management systems: Automated report generation with template population and distribution capabilities
Action item tracking tools: Automated assignment with follow-up reminders and completion validation
historicalAnalysisCapabilities: Business intelligence platforms: Multi-year trend analysis with cross-incident correlation and visualization capabilities
Data warehousing solutions: Historical data aggregation with quality validation and normalization processes
Advanced analytics platforms: Predictive analytics with root cause analysis and impact assessment capabilities
Interactive dashboard tools: Executive reporting with drill-down capabilities and stakeholder-specific views
Data quality management: Automated validation with completeness checking and accuracy verification
vulnerabilityIntegrationPlatforms: Vulnerability management systems: Automated CVE correlation with exploitation tracking and remediation integration
Patch management platforms: Remediation effectiveness analysis with timeline tracking and success measurement
Threat intelligence feeds: IoC correlation with threat actor attribution and campaign identification
Risk assessment platforms: Vulnerability prioritization with incident data integration and predictive capabilities
Security orchestration tools: Automated vulnerability-incident linking with response workflow integration

iso27001.A.16.1.4: Assessment of and decision on information security events

checks.name: Comprehensive Incident Log Management
checks.description: Incident logs should be maintained with comprehensive data retention and integrity protection

logDataStructureAndStandardization.incidentClassificationSchema: NIST Computer Security Incident Handling Guide

logAccessControlAndSecurity.logEncryption: AES-256 at rest and TLS 1.3 in transit

testResults.test: Incident log data structure and integrity validation
testResults.details: STIX 2.1 compatible with cryptographic integrity protection and immutable storage

testResults.test: Log access control and security implementation assessment
testResults.details: Role-based access with MFA, comprehensive auditing, and AES-256 encryption
FedRAMP retention compliance with 99.97% uptime and cross-region disaster recovery

checks.remediation: Incident log management comprehensively implemented with strong security and compliance alignment

checks.name: Automated Pattern Analysis and Trend Identification
checks.description: Incident logs should be analyzed for patterns, trends, and vulnerabilities using automated capabilities

testResults.test: Pattern analysis and ML capability assessment
testResults.details: Azure ML integration with anomaly detection and automated weekly trend reports

testResults.test: Attack vector and vulnerability analysis effectiveness
testResults.details: MITRE ATT&CK mapping with automated CVE correlation and threat intelligence integration

testResults.test: Actionable insights generation and recommendation quality
testResults.details: AI-generated remediation recommendations with predictive analytics and benchmarking

checks.remediation: Pattern analysis comprehensively implemented with advanced ML capabilities and intelligent recommendation generation

checks.name: Incident Review Schedule and Process Automation
checks.description: Incident logs should be reviewed periodically according to a defined schedule with automated process management

testResults.test: Review schedule implementation and automation assessment
testResults.details: Multi-frequency review schedule with 98.7% completion rate and automated process management
100% security and operations participation with 4.6/5 stakeholder satisfaction

testResults.test: Review output integration and action tracking
testResults.details: 94.3% action item completion with automated tracking and system integration

checks.remediation: Incident review processes comprehensively automated with effective stakeholder management and integration capabilities

checks.name: Limited Historical Data Analysis and Correlation
checks.description: Historical incident data analysis lacks depth and correlation capabilities for comprehensive pattern identification

testResults.test: Historical data analysis depth and trend identification
testResults.details: Surface-level analysis limited to 6 months with no cross-year comparison
Basic temporal analysis with no cross-system or cross-stakeholder correlation
Limited predictive analytics with manual executive reporting and basic visualization

checks.remediation: MEDIUM PRIORITY: 1) Implement comprehensive historical data analysis with multi-year trend identification and seasonal pattern recognition, 2) Establish advanced correlation analysis capabilities across incidents, systems, time periods, and stakeholders, 3) Improve data quality and completeness with systematic validation and normalization processes, 4) Deploy advanced analytics capabilities including predictive analysis, comprehensive root cause analysis, and risk assessment integration, 5) Create interactive reporting and visualization capabilities with stakeholder-specific dashboards and executive integration, 6) Develop automated historical data maintenance with quality assurance and accuracy validation

checks.name: Insufficient Vulnerability Pattern Integration
checks.description: Incident logs lack comprehensive integration with vulnerability management for pattern identification and remediation tracking

testResults.details: 45% incident-vulnerability mapping with manual CVE correlation and basic recurrence tracking
No integration between vulnerability remediation and incident tracking with manual assessment

testResults.test: Threat intelligence integration and predictive capabilities
testResults.details: Limited threat intelligence integration with no predictive vulnerability exploitation capabilities

checks.remediation: HIGH PRIORITY: 1) Implement comprehensive vulnerability management integration with automated CVE correlation and exploitation tracking, 2) Establish systematic incident-vulnerability linking with automated mapping and impact assessment, 3) Create integrated remediation tracking with patching effectiveness analysis and success metrics, 4) Deploy advanced threat intelligence integration with IoC correlation and threat actor attribution, 5) Develop predictive vulnerability exploitation capabilities with attack likelihood assessment and proactive defense recommendations, 6) Integrate vulnerability prioritization with incident data for risk-based remediation planning

checks.name: Missing Incident Lifecycle Analytics
checks.description: Incident logs lack comprehensive lifecycle analytics for response effectiveness measurement and process optimization

testResults.test: Incident lifecycle tracking and measurement capabilities
testResults.details: Basic response time measurement with no systematic detection or containment time analysis

testResults.test: Response effectiveness and resource utilization analysis
testResults.details: No response effectiveness metrics or resource utilization analysis with limited stakeholder satisfaction tracking
Manual bottleneck identification with no systematic process improvement or industry benchmarking

checks.remediation: MEDIUM PRIORITY: 1) Implement comprehensive incident lifecycle tracking with systematic measurement of detection, response, containment, recovery, and closure times, 2) Establish response effectiveness metrics with escalation analysis, communication measurement, and stakeholder satisfaction tracking, 3) Deploy resource utilization analysis with staff, technology, and cost per incident measurement for capacity planning, 4) Create automated process optimization capabilities with bottleneck identification and workflow improvement recommendations, 5) Implement benchmarking and comparison capabilities with industry standards and historical performance analysis, 6) Develop incident response maturity measurement with best practice alignment assessment and continuous improvement tracking
